io.mpos.paymentdetails
Interface PaymentDetailsFactory

public interface PaymentDetailsFactory

Factory used to create specific payment params to proceed with a transaction

Since:
2.0.0

Method Summary
 PaymentDetails createPaymentDetails(PaymentDetailsScheme scheme)
          Creates new payment params that can be used in conjunction with a transaction object to execute it.
 PaymentDetails createPaymentDetails(PaymentDetailsScheme scheme, PaymentDetailsSource source, PaymentDetailsCustomerVerification verification)
           
 

Method Detail

createPaymentDetails

PaymentDetails createPaymentDetails(PaymentDetailsScheme scheme)
Creates new payment params that can be used in conjunction with a transaction object to execute it. This type of payment params is used for automated collection workflows like EMV or MagstripeCapture.

Parameters:
scheme - The type of the payment params that should be used
Returns:
A new set of payment params
Throws:
MposRuntimeException - If the parameters are not valid
Since:
2.0.0

createPaymentDetails

PaymentDetails createPaymentDetails(PaymentDetailsScheme scheme,
                                    PaymentDetailsSource source,
                                    PaymentDetailsCustomerVerification verification)
